skilllist.skilldesc:
After each skill cast, Edith and Phylax become Overloaded for 3s, during which all Basic Attacks will trigger chain lightning, dealing extra <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> equal to <font color="62f8fe"> (+20% Total Magic Power)</font> plus 3(+0.2*Hero Level)% of the target's Max HP to up to 4 enemies.
Chain lightning damage against Minions is increased to 150%.

After a 0.75s delay, Edith controls Phylax to launch an earth-shattering blow in a designated direction, dealing 225<font color="26e407"> (+10% Total HP)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit (deals 120% damage to minions) and knocking them airborne for 0.8s.
This skill can only be interrupted by Suppression.

Edith controls Phylax to charge in the target direction, dealing 90<font color="26e407"> (+3% Total HP)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies along the way.

If Phylax hits an enemy hero during the charge, it will stop immediately and throw them over its shoulder, dealing 108<font color="26e407"> (+5% Total HP)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive:</font> When inside Phylax, Edith can accumulate Wrath according to the damage she receives (calculated before damage reduction).

<font color="a6aafb">Active:</font> Edith ejects herself forward from Phylax, knocking back nearby enemies. After that, she takes flight and can perform ranged Basic Attacks, each dealing 35<font color="fba51f"> (+75% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+25% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>. Edith also gains new skills in this state. When in flight, Edith gains 350<font color="26e407"> (+5% Total HP)</font>-350<font color="26e407"> (+20% Total HP)</font> extra Shield, 50%-150% extra Attack Speed and 5%-20% Hybrid Lifesteal based on the Wrath she accumulated, and converts each point of <font color="26e407">Extra Physical Defense</font> and <font color="26e407">Extra Magic Defense</font> into 3.5 <font color="62f8fe">Magic Power</font>. The flight state lasts up to 8s.

After each skill cast, Edith and Phylax become Overloaded for 3s, during which all Basic Attacks will trigger chain lightning, dealing extra <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> equal to <font color="62f8fe"> (+20% Total Magic Power)</font> plus 3(+0.2*Hero Level)% of the target's Max HP to up to 4 enemies.
Chain lightning damage against Minions is increased to 150%.

Edith exacts Divine Retribution on a target area, dealing 170<font color="62f8fe"> (+40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 30%. She then continues to deal 68<font color="62f8fe"> (+16% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in the area every 0.5s over the next 1.5s.

Edith fires a Lightning Bolt in a designated direction, dealing 150<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the first enemy hero hit and immobilizing them for 0.8s.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive:</font> When inside Phylax, Edith can accumulate Wrath according to the damage she receives (calculated before damage reduction).

<font color="a6aafb">Active:</font> Edith ejects herself forward from Phylax, knocking back nearby enemies. After that, she takes flight and can perform ranged Basic Attacks, each dealing 35<font color="fba51f"> (+75% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+25% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>. Edith also gains new skills in this state. When in flight, Edith gains 350<font color="26e407"> (+5% Total HP)</font>-350<font color="26e407"> (+20% Total HP)</font> extra Shield, 50%-150% extra Attack Speed and 5%-20% Hybrid Lifesteal based on the Wrath she accumulated, and converts each point of <font color="26e407">Extra Physical Defense</font> and <font color="26e407">Extra Magic Defense</font> into 3.5 <font color="62f8fe">Magic Power</font>. The flight state lasts up to 8s.

__data.skilldesc:
For up to 8 Basic Attacks within the next 5s, increase Attack Speed to 1.5 times and the Attack Speed cap to 500%.
The Basic Attacks also <font color="62f8fe">ignore</font> 8 (+1*Hero Level) of the target's <font color="ffe63c">Physical Defense</font> and restore 60<font color="fba51f">(+0.15 Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+0.15 Total Magic Power)</font> HP on hit.
__data.skilldesc_text: For up to <Num2> Basic Attacks within the next <Num1>s, increase Attack Speed to <Num3> times and the Attack Speed cap to <%Num4>.####The Basic Attacks also [C2ignore] <Num5> of the target's [C5Physical Defense] and restore <Num6> HP on hit.
__data.skilldescemblem:
For up to 8 Basic Attacks within the next 5s, increase Attack Speed to 1.5 times and the Attack Speed cap to 500%.
The Basic Attacks also <font color="62f8fe">ignore</font> 8 (+1*Hero Level) of the target's <font color="ffe63c">Physical Defense</font> and restore 60<font color="fba51f">(+15% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+15% Total Magic Power)</font> HP on hit.

+4 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill2: Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.

equiplist.equipskill1: Deter: When hit by a skill, reduces the attacker's Physical Damage by 6% for 2s (this effect stacks up to 3 times).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Deter: When hit by a skill, reduces the attacker's Physical Damage by 6% for 2s (this effect stacks up to 3 times).
equiplist.equiptips:
+920 Extra Max HP
+40 Extra Physical Defense
+4 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+500 Mana
+55 Extra Physical Defense
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.

equiplist.equipskill1:
Thunderbolt: Every 4s, the next Basic Attack deals 50<font color="26e407"> (+1 Extra Physical Defense)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+1 Extra Magic Defense)</font> extra True Damage to the target and enemies around them, and briefly slows them by 99%. Hybrid Defense permanently increases by 1 each time the attack hits an enemy hero.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect is reduced to 50% for Marksmen and Mages.</font>
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Thunderbolt: Every 4s, the next Basic Attack deals 50<font color="26e407"> (+1 Extra Physical Defense)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+1 Extra Magic Defense)</font> extra True Damage to the target and enemies around them, and briefly slows them by 99%. Hybrid Defense permanently increases by 1 each time the attack hits an enemy hero.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect is reduced to 50% for Marksmen and Mages.</font>

+15 Extra Physical Defense
+15 Extra Magic Defense
+20 Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Bladed Armor: When struck by a Basic Attack, deals Physical Damage equal to 30% of the incoming damage (calculated before Damage Reduction) plus <font color="26e407"> (+0.2 Total Physical Defense)</font> to the attacker and slows them by 15% for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Bladed Armor: When struck by a Basic Attack, deals Physical Damage equal to 30% of the incoming damage (calculated before Damage Reduction) plus <font color="26e407"> (+0.2 Total Physical Defense)</font> to the attacker and slows them by 15% for 1s.

+20% Crit Damage Reduction
+70 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.

+2 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Crisis: In 3s after using the skill, the caster's next Basic Attack will apply additional 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> True Damage with a cooldown of 1.5s. Then briefly gains 10% Movement Speed.

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.

recommendmasterplan.name: BF - Marbon
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

assist.desc: Edith works best with heroes like Minotaur and Atlas that can more reliably CC a target first, allowing her to follow up with her own CC.

strong.desc: Edith is strong against heroes that are not very agile and on the fragile side, such as Zilong and Aulus, because her skills deal enough burst damage to eliminate them after connecting with her 2nd Skill.

weak.desc: Edith is countered by Marksmen that can negate CC like Hanabi and Wanwan, since she will have a hard time locking them down.
